column10:
1) The Shogun is not pleased to see our team in his tent and calls the guards.
2) The team knocks out the guards and the Shogun must listen to their story.
3) The team has Masaru explain his father’s betrayal. 
4) The Shogun is shocked, but quickly regains his control.
5) The Shogun sends the team to Noboru's castle, where they must kill him.
The team enters the Shogun's tent together. The Shogun is not pleased to see them.

column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Shogun's private tent
column12: 将军大帐

column10: Hmm, so ... you have come ...
column12: 嗯？…是你们……看来……

column10: ... to think, not even 300.000 men could stop you.
column12: ……即便有三十万大军也拦不住你们。

column10: My Shogun …
column12: 将军大人……

column10: Do what you must then. I will not waste another word for the butchers of my son.
column12: 动手吧。我不想和杀害我儿子的凶手多费口舌。

column10: We never laid hands on your son. Neither were we responsible for the death of Ōshiro Mugen. It was your brother who twisted the truth to his desire.
column12: 我们没有杀害龙之介大人。尾城无限的死，也不是我们造成的。在背后歪曲真相的，正是将军大人您的兄弟。

column10: Why should I believe this outrageous accusation? What proof do you have?
column12: 我为何要相信这种大逆不道的说辞？你有什么证据？

column10: We have a witness.
column12: 属下有证人。

column9: Hayato dumps Masaru before the Shogun
column10: Agh!
column12: 啊啊！

column10: My nephew? Is this supposed to work in your favour?
column12: 这不是我侄儿吗？他还能替你们说话不成？

column10: This creature killed your son with his own hands.
column12: 这个人渣，亲手杀了你儿子。

column9: tries to save his hide by lying
column10: Lies uncle, lies! I saw that filthy Shinobi put a blade in his back. He, he killed Ryūnosuke!
column12: 他们说谎，叔父！说谎！我亲眼看到这个下贱的忍者用刀偷袭的。是他…就是他杀了龙之介!

column10: No! He's lying!
column12: 不是的！他在撒谎!

column10: … hmm ... go on, nephew.
column12: ……嗯……继续说，侄儿。

column10: He killed Mugen-sensei, too. They all seek to deceive you, uncle. They hurt me, they told me to lie to you, but I won't!
column12: 他还杀了无限老师。他们都在骗你，叔父。他们拷打我，要挟我，让我欺骗你，但我不会屈服！

column10: And you know all this because you saw the murder happen, yes?
column12: 你之所以知道这一切，是因为你亲眼看见了，对吧？

column10: I … I'm not …
column12: 不…不是的…

column10: Why were you there? How did you know where Ryūnosuke was hidden?
column12: 你当时为何在那儿？你是怎么知道龙之介藏在哪里的？

column10: Uncle! You don't understand … !
column12: 叔父！你误会了我的意思！……

column10: You cannot lie to me, nephew. Answer me now, truthfully.
column12: 你骗不了我的，侄儿。现在，如实回答我。

column10: Who, in this room, has murdered my son?
column12: 是谁？在场的人当中，到底是谁，杀了我的儿子？

column10: Please, uncle. I only did what father told me. I didn't want to, he made me, he gave me the knife, it wasn't my fault I …
column12: 饶命啊，叔父。我只是按照我父亲说的做。我也不想啊，是父亲他事先准备好刀，然后逼我的。这不能怪我……

column10: Enough! Not another word.
column12: 够了!不准你再说一个字。

column10: Noboru ... my own brother … all this time …
column12: 昇……我的亲弟弟……原来他一直……

column10: He blinded us all.
column12: 蒙骗了我们所有人。

column10: I should have seen it. His eagerness for battle. His disapproval whenever we spoke of peaceful solutions.
column12: 我早该察觉到的。他执着于战争。每次谈到和平方案，他都反对。

column10: My brother never wanted peace. He was made for conquest.  Were he born a century ago; he would have been the greatest warlord.
column12: 我的弟弟从来不想要和平，只想着征服。如果他早出生百年，肯定会成为最强的统帅吧。

column10: A shadow of the past, darkening the present day.
column12: 过去的黑暗，却能遮蔽如今的光明。

column10: We all desire revenge for what was lost.
column12: 我们几个很想为各自失去的一切复仇。

column10: But we will follow your command, as did Mugen before us.
column12: 但我们会遵照您的命令，就像无限当初那样。

column10: Mugen … even in death he proves his loyalty.
column12: 无限……即便死了，依然在用这种方式表达对我的一片忠心么。

column10: I will not grant my brother an honourable death. He will die forgotten, a brief mention in the annals of history.
column12: 我不会给我弟弟一个光荣的死法。他的死只会被遗忘，尘封在史书中一个不起眼的角落。

column10: Seek him out in his domain, at Sunpu Castle! Face him and do what must be done!
column12: 去他的老巢骏府城把他揪出来！给他应有的下场！

column10: We will discuss your future when you return.
column12: 至于你们的待遇，就等回来再说。

column10: As you command, my Shogun.
column12: 遵命，将军大人。

column10: Now go. We have wasted enough time already.
column12: 快去吧。我们已经浪费了太多时间。

column10: And now, to you, nephew.
column12: 现在，轮到你了，侄儿。
